metadata.name: File Download Via InstallUtil.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects use of .NET InstallUtil.exe in order to download arbitrary files. The files will be written to "%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE\"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\installutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('installutil.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ftp://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))))

output.summary: Detects use of .NET InstallUtil.exe in order to download arbitrary files. The files will be written to "%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE\"
